channel.title: TFS Top Tip #5 - What to do if you lock yourself out of your repository
channel.description: This tip is a follow up from my rather less helpful post “Don’t Do That” where I discussed the “Inherit security settings” option in the security settings tab for the Source Control Explorer when talking to Team Foundation Server.  The...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ryan+00:00
item.description: Great tip. Thanks. Very annoying feature. Appreciate the workaround.
item.dc:creator: Ryan
